title: Distressed, Ripped Jeans: They’re Happening Again
sub_head: Believe it or not, the grungy, 1990s-style men’s denim trend is back. Here, how to wear tattered blues without overdoing it.
body:
TRY AS YOU MIGHT, in fashion, you can’t outrun the past.
Distressed jeans, a 1990s favorite among grunge disciples and then a trickle-down, suburban-mall trend for the next decade-plus, are rearing their tattered knees again.
